message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for us at $1200000. Given its significance and the potential it holds for you, I am extending an offer to acquire it for $1100000. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.
